dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependencies.description: Execute code after a scope finished compilation.
dependencies.name: perl-b-hooks-endofscope

dependent_to.description:
LCOV is a graphical front-end for GCC's coverage testing tool gcov. It
collects gcov data for multiple source files and creates HTML pages
containing the source code annotated with coverage information. It also
adds overview pages for easy navigation within the file structure. LCOV
supports statement, function and branch coverage measurement.
dependent_to.name: lcov

dependent_to.description: Visitor style traversal of Perl data structures
dependent_to.name: perl-data-visitor

dependent_to.description: Extensible and flexible object <-> relational mapper.
dependent_to.name: perl-dbix-class

dependent_to.description: Emulate Class::Accessor::Fast behavior using Moose attributes
dependent_to.name: perl-moosex-emulate-class-accessor-fast

dependent_to.description: Namespace::Autoclean - Keep imports out of your namespace
dependent_to.name: perl-namespace-autoclean

dependent_to.description:
This module lets you check your module's namespaces for imported
functions you might have forgotten to remove
dependent_to.name: perl-test-cleannamespaces

description: Keep imports and functions out of your namespace.
name: perl-namespace-clean

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
